summary: The diff implements forced light mode across the app by wrapping all App render branches in a `ThemeProvider` configured for light theme only, removing/preventing any `dark` class on `html`, and setting `color-scheme: light` in global CSS and `index.html`. No explicit BuildRequest requirements appear to be missing based on the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to internal project tracking metadata marking the request as pending (project_state.json new_feature_requests entries)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on enforcing light mode behavior and ensuring theme styles apply; it does not request changes to project tracking/metadata files.
